alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 19 at 3:36PM AKST until December 21 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches possible. Lighter snow amounts for Gustavus and Hoonah regions. Higher snow totals for Juneau, Petersburg, and Wrangell. * WHERE...Icy Strait corridor and Central Inner Channels including Juneau, Gustavus, Hoonah, Petersburg, Wrangell, and Kake. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may be hazardous at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
